meanings.definition: The state or quality of being a saint.
meanings.sent1: Her saintdom was evident in her kind actions towards others.
meanings.sent2: The village celebrated the saintdom of their local hero.
meanings.sent3: In the land of make-believe, even the animals aspired to saintdom.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the essence of saintdom in his painting of the holy figure.
meanings.sent5: The aura of saintdom surrounded the humble nun wherever she went.

meanings.sent1: The church displayed a painting depicting the entire saintdom.
meanings.sent2: Pilgrims from around the world visited the city to honor the saintdom.
meanings.sent3: The saintdom gathered for their annual feast, sharing stories of miracles.
meanings.sent4: In the museum, relics from the saintdom were carefully preserved.
meanings.sent5: Legends spoke of the power and unity within the saintdom.
